recipe.title: Creamy Garlic Penne Pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook penne in the boiling water until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes. Drain.
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir garlic in melted butter until softened, about 2 minutes.
Stir flour into garlic and butter until combined; slowly stream milk and cream into flour mixture while continuously stirring.
Cook sauce until thickened, about 5 minutes. Stir Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper into sauce until cheese is melted, about 2 minutes more.
Toss cooked penne pasta with sauce to coat.

response.flavour_note: Adds a subtle coconut undertone, but the richness and creaminess will be very similar.
